# The `AsmOperandInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This contains information for each constraint that we are lowering.

## Public Member Attributes

### CallOperandVal {#aeea750ec380d5c1514f57df90dbd6c3d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value&#42; llvm::TargetLowering::AsmOperandInfo::CallOperandVal = nullptr</>}>
If this is the result output operand or a clobber, this is null, otherwise it is the incoming operand to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a>.

This gets modified as the asm is processed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetlowering-h/#l04990">4990</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetlowering-h">TargetLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ConstraintCode {#acaa17aeb01534f4ef06085783d0cd065}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="std::string llvm::TargetLowering::AsmOperandInfo::ConstraintCode">
This contains the actual string for the code, like &quot;m&quot;.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> picks the &#39;best&#39; code from ConstraintInfo::Codes that most closely matches the operand.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetlowering-h/#l04981">4981</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetlowering-h">TargetLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ConstraintType {#ab6af857f66a2fc271535a12203d7dad6}

<MemberDefinition

Information about the constraint code, e.g.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a>, RegisterClass, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory">Memory</a>, Other, Unknown.
